entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023
